Articles.Content:
So after holding out for quite a while I have finally succumbed and got started with KSP, watched quite a few videos to get the basics down and now trying to get my reusable deep space explorer complete and working, then figure out how to refuel the thing, since it has a massive fuel capacity.

Not lost many Kerbals just yet, but going to start with SSTOs next, so that may change..

G

Welcome to the community gazzareth

Good luck with the SSTO's, they can be tricky but thankfully there's a lot of people here who will be glad to give you some advice if you need it.

Have fun and fly safe
